title: RuPaul's Drag Race queens never told who celeb judge is before runway
text:
As if the pressure of walking in front of RuPaul and Michelle Visage isn’t enough (Picture: BBC)

Sum Ting Wong has revealed that the Drag Race queens has ‘no idea’ who the celebrity judge is until they step out on the runway.

Yes, as if the pressure of walking in front of RuPaul and Michelle Visage isn’t enough, they also have to deal with not knowing who else will be there to judge their outfits, their walks, and that week’s challenges.

The pressure!

‘[We have] no idea,’ said Sum Ting, ‘they told us Lorraine Kelly and Stacey Dooley were going to be there but I had no idea about Geri [Horner].

‘It was the most iconic thing to ever happen in my life,’ said Sum Ting of meeting the former Spice Girls star, ‘it was the perfect episode, such a nice way to go’.

‘Geri coming in at the end was the icing on the cake I didn’t need, the doughnut you have after dinner even when you don’t need it!’

Caption: Sum Ting Wong attending the RuPaul Drag race premiere, Bloomsbury Ballroom, London. PRESS ASSOCIATION Photo. Picture date: Tuesday September 17, 2019. See PA story SHOWBIZ RuPaul. Photo credit should read: Ian West/PA Wire

Photographer: Ian West

Provider: PA

Source: PA

Copyright: PA

Spice Girls star Geri has reinvented her image in recent years, making a somewhat unusual guest judge for the sweary innuendo fest that is Drag Race, with a number of fans calling her ‘dull’ in comparison to her fellow judges.

Advertisement

Advertisement

But Sum Ting reckons that Geri was ‘iconic’ and the perfect judge.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

‘I was fine until she came in, and when she came in I thought “what is happening, is this a joke?”‘ she said.

‘She said so many lovely things and I don’t cry normally so when she said “you are the embodiment of drag and everything I love about drag”, she said I give off this warmth and loving energy and “you don’t know how special that is”, and I was like “[random noise] I love you!’

RuPaul’s Drag Race UK continues on Thursday nights on BBC Three.

description: RuPaul's Drag Race UK star Sum Ting Wong revealed she had no idea Geri Horner would be judging.
